attributes.title: Sadashiva Rahasya - The Sacred Secret of Sadashiva
attributes.description: This discourse delivered on 8 Aug 2017, Paramahamsa Nithyananda reveals the next level of Mahadeva rahasya (i.e.,)Sadashiva rahasya. The state in which you are and the space in which you operate and manifest a command it should become a reality if not you manifested with less power. The solution is create the command with more persistence.
